name: Don't Let It Feed
description:
Made For Mini Jam

Player Controller : Hold Mouse Left Click.  

Drag green squares to triangles to destroy them OR

Drag red square to green squares and destroy them with it.

Don't let red square to touch white squares and green circle.  If it touches it will be destroyed.

Purpose of the game is don't let green circle to feed with green squares!  

Think green circle like radiation , when it feed it grows.
